p.d: Ferraille has to face up to his past and Rita tries to get to the bottom of the story. Gilberte is worried about Terri, who has changed. Is she depressed? Terri surprises Lomer and Gilberte in a distinctly compromising situation... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 2, Canada, 2019) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
